name: Atelier Totori - Totooria Helmold トトゥーリア・ヘルモルト LoRA
description:
Atelier Totori - Totooria Helmold トトゥーリア・ヘルモルト LoRA

Trained mostly based on official artworks.

Recommended CFG: 5-6

Recommended weight: 0.8-1 (depends on your personal settings)

Recommended prompt: blue sleeves, detached sleeves, skirt, dress, bare shoulders, blush, collarbone, strapless, hat, frills, flat chest, bow, back bow,

NOTE: if you do not want to get ribbon or bad back bow generation results, removing bow, back bow from your prompt can help you.

I used to train 7 version of Totori LoRA, this LoRA version is the best one.

The reason her LoRA is so difficult to produce is largely due to her clothes. With a limited training sample, you'll have a hard time finding quality clothing details to use as a reference. So I had to spend more time on tag editing. I tried generating it several times and it has a relatively good performance at 768*1024 resolution.

modelVersions.name: v1a
modelVersions.description:
First version

Existing possible problems:

  1. blurry hat/hair ornament

  2. slightly incorrect dress (not often happen)

  3. back bow, bow, ribbon bad generation results

The refined version is on my schedule. I probably will redraw some sample images by myself.
